documents.document: @CodenameMinaLi (the slacks/pantsuits she wore were just as professional, and she definitely had me pick out one or two myself.)
@CodenameMinaLi I remember in that era when my mom was working, and I don't think I saw her wearing slacks until she changed jobs.
I have a feeling that dress code will drag it back to like, the 1970s/1980s, where skirts/skirt suits were appropriate v. pantsuits.
@Gwenda can't have women wearin' pants and being all uppity! ::gag::
@amithaknight policing what women wear to work is bad enough, this is probably going to drag us back to the 1970s or so.
how much you wanna guess pantsuits are going to be against the policy? https://t.co/ogU5o8JFVH

@IoriKusano ugh, I'm sorry you had to go through that.
@CodenameMinaLi I'm glad I won't have to see this crap on CNN at least. Will PBS follow suit?
@CodenameMinaLi and by "love" I mean "hate" because this is pretty much gaslighting
